text: Audi AG is a German automobile manufacturer with headquarters in Ingolstadt, Bavaria, and has been an almost wholly-owned (99.7%) subsidiary of the Volkswagen Group since 1964. Audi AG was founded by August Horch and the current CEO of Audi AG is Rupert Stadler. 1909 ==Models== ===old model range=== The following tables list Audi production vehicles that are sold as of 2021 Audi cars A1 * Sportback (5-door fastback) A3 * Saloon * Sportback (5-door fastback) * Cabriolet A4 * Saloon * Avant (estate) * Allroad (crossover estate) A5 * Coupé * Sportback (5-door fastback) * Cabriolet (convertible) A6 * Saloon * Avant (estate) * Allroad (crossover estate) A7 * Sportback (5-door hatchback) A8 * Saloon Audi coupés and SUVs TT * Coupé * Roadster (convertible) R8 * Coupé * Spyder (convertible) Q2 * SUV Q3 * SUV Q5 * SUV Q7 * SUV Q8 * SUV e-tron * SUV ===S and RS models=== S (Sport) models S3 * 3-door hatchback * Sportback (5-door fastback) S4 * Saloon * Avant (estate) * Coupé * Cabriolet (convertible) * Sportback (5-door fastback) * Coupé * Roadster (convertible) * Crossover * Crossover RS (Racing Sport) models * Coupé * Roadster (convertible) RS3 * Saloon * 5-door hatchback * Avant (estate) RS5 * Coupé * Cabriolet (convertible) ==References== Category:Automobile brands Category:Ingolstadt
